page.title: 20The Deer.
page.content: We were whisking to school by car when we came to the crossroads. We went a little way past a tiny field which belongs to Dene College.Suddenly there was a stir in the long grass, up came a fawny head with brown,dark, sad and solemn eyes, his face looked as though it was made of velvet.It was a deer. We felt so excited, it is not every day you see a deer, it is an unusual sight but we did not see it for long because it ran into the woods. We were told that the mother deer is dead she was run over when taking it across the road so it is an orphan. So we must drive carefully. Jennifer
